SEARCH
Package com.pdfjet

Class TextBox

java.lang.Object
com.pdfjet.TextBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class TextBox extends Object implements Drawable
A box containing line-wrapped text.

Defaults: x = 0f y = 0f width = 300f height = 0f alignment = Align.LEFT valign = Align.TOP spacing = 0f margin = 0f

This class was originally developed by Ronald Bourret. It was completely rewritten in 2013 by Eugene Dragoev.
